comment: I used to hate Math and never thought I could do any good in it but he changed everything. He spent time and effort to make videos that help students understand Math problems before classes. In classes, he gave quizzes to check us. You just need to watch the videos carefully before class and make sure you fully understand, you will get an A easily.
HANDS DOWN AWESOME PROFESSOR. IF YOU DO THE HOMEWORK AND STUDY THE CLASS IS AN EASY A. VERY HELPFUL.

He's very approachable and pretty good at explaining the concepts. Sometimes he can get a little too involved in teaching proofs and stuff but it's a math class so I can't complain. And he's such a cutie too!

He is a bit scatter brained, nerdy, and awkward. But I loved his class! he's a great teacher, the quizzes can get hard and the tests are a little hard as well. There is a lot of mymathlab homework required at least 2 sets a week sometimes 4. take him if you are moderately good at math.
Was a great professor. Only problem was he would keep class late 2-5mins almost everyday. Still totally worth taking

EXCELLENT PROFESSOR!!!! I am not great at math and was terrified of this class.  He made the material very easy to understand.  Provides lots of points, homework counts the same as a test grade. Important to come to class, quizzes given just about daily, but most can be worked with a partner.
He's nice and goofy. The class is easy if you study even a little. He gives a lot of points throughout the semester. And the tests are really easy, they are just like the study guide.

Enjoyed this class even though math is not my strong point, prof is a bit of a nerd, but he is a very good teacher, all homework is online, quizzes in class almost every day, but if you go to class they will only improve your grade

Professor Martin is very good, and gives lots of examples in class. If you take him be prepared to stay from start to finish and take small quizzes each class, but they are super easy and you can work in groups. Not hard to make an A in his class and his exams are exactly like all the practice problems you do in class. Take him!

TAKE HIM! he is the best MATH teacher i have ever had... he gives out worksheets for you to fill in while he teaches which is super helpful.. he does have a nerdy side which makes class funny, and HE SPEAKS CLEARLY so you know what he is saying...I would take him again!!!

this class is by far my favorite. Professor is kind of nerdy, but hilarious. he's the nicest guy! every other class you have a quiz, and every three quizzes is a test. there are three tests total. this class, along with any math class you'll take, has lots of homework. definitely worth it! my favorite class, and I hate math!

Great Professor.  Extremely caring and available.  Responsive to emails and office visits.  Clear in class.  Expect a lot of MyMathLab Homework. Good review materials. Drops lowest 2 quizzes. 25% cumulative Final.  Will need to work hard to get good grade. Many opportunites for extra points on homework and quizzes.  Best Math Professor at KSU.

This is a hard class (40% of students either withdraw, get a D, or fail) but Mr. Lingle-Martin makes it better. He makes himself available to you, answers your questions, and really wants you to succeed. He cares about his students understanding the material.
He is awesome
BEST MATH TEACHER. He is the best math teacher at KSU. He is kind of goofy but that's what makes the class fun. He is a great teacher. I would and am taking more classes that he teaches.

He is one of the best teachers I have ever had. He is very patient with students and makes himself available. Class alone isn't enough; notes sheet, office hours, complete all homework prior to test, and study guide combined will help you get an A in this class because Calc is a hard subject. I had no prior experience and I got an A with hard work

If you are good at math and took precalc or calc in h.s. then maybe this is the teacher for you.  He was not the teacher for me.  I spent many sleepless nights over this class.  He would show examples in class that weren't too bad, but on the exams the same type of problems were made impossibly harder.

I don't like to say mean things so I will just say this: I do not recommend this professor at all. Extremely unclear. I was amazed that instead of teaching us how to solve problems, he just stood up and solved them while we watched.  Big regret

Awful professor. Though he makes himself available and gives you a note sheet he does not make what he wants you to do clear. He does not speak well. he shows you things that you don't need to know and never gets straight to the point. I left his class frustrated. Mistakes on the study guide so you never knew what was wrong or right. DO NOT TAKE!

If you are good at math then the class will be very easy. He allows you to use a note sheet on tests which is very helpful... my only problem was the online homework, way too much online homework to do very unnecessary.

extremely easy to understand and have absolute knowledge of his job. easy A if you come to class or at least get the notes. also use the exam study guide as tools for exams but not "mymathlab". The only problem he have sometimes is just that he is mathematically correct and might use words that can confuse some students who are not paying attention

Great professor. He cares and he is helpful in anyway that he can be.  Go to EVERY class, copy his notes exactly, study only his notes for the quizzes and tests and you will get at least a B.  The homework is online but DO NOT use it as a study tool for his tests or quizzes. The examples in class are all that you need.  Best math class at KSU.

I had him for Elem Applied Calc and I thought he was pretty good.  He makes himself available, but isn't always so clear in the way he explains things.  Really nice guy, just go to class and make and effort, and you'll do fine.  Don't expect an A, it's Calculus, after all.  Make sure to do the homework on mymathlab.  He offers bonus on there.

Really bad teacher. Do not take him. Drops the lowest quiz but cannot teach. Beginning of semester wasn't so bad but mid and end is just awful. Tests are hard and study guide doesn't help. Gets confused and has no speaking skill. Even admitted he wasn't sure how to present a problem.
